title: Design Thinking-Integrated Project-Based Science Problem-Solving Process

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and experimental methods comprehension, online collaboration tool experience
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen practical problem-solving abilities in science, utilizing community issues as project themes

learning_goals: Students can design and implement science-based problem-solving projects by applying the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Learners can complete science projects addressing community issues in teams using online collaboration tools and submit outcomes to the LMS
Over 80% of participants can achieve 85+ points based on the project evaluation rubric criteria (Creativity, Scientific Validity, Feasibility)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
